Package model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.Player
public class Player extends Object
This is Player class to define movement, impact and design of player bar which is used to catch the ball.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Point ballPoint, int width, int height, Rectangle container)
      This is a constructor to initialise some variables in Player class.
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - center point of ball
      width - width of player bar
      height - height of player bar
      container - draw area to draw the player bar

  • Method Details

    • makeRectangle

      private Rectangle makeRectangle(int width, int height)
      This method is to make player bar.
      Parameters:
      width - width of player bar
      height - height of player bar
      Returns:
      player bar that has been made

    • impact

      public boolean impact(Ball b)
      This method returns true if the ball touches the player, i.e. the bottom of the ball and the centre of the ball touches the player bar.
      Parameters:
      b - Ball object
      Returns:
      true is returned if the centre and bottom of the ball touches the player bar

    • move

      public void move()
      This method is used to move the player bar.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      This method moves the player bar to the left.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      This method moves the player bar to the right.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      This method stops the movement of player bar.

    • getPlayerFace

      public Shape getPlayerFace()
      This method returns player bar to the calling method.
      Returns:
      player bar

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(Point p)
      This method is to move the ball to a particular point specified by the parameter passed to this method.
      Parameters:
      p - point to move the ball to

    • getMoveAmount

      public int getMoveAmount()
      This method is to return move amount of player bar to the calling method (mainly used for testing purpose).
